about_the_game:
What if characters in RPGs would actually have personalities, world-knowledge, backstories and motivations? What if you could interact with them and get a more immersive experience?

This is what Solse AI-Quest explores. A unique and immersive retro-style RPG where every conversation truly matters. Experience a gaming adventure like never before, with advanced AI that brings in-game characters to life through natural and dynamic interactions.



Experience natural and dynamic interactions with in-game characters like never before, thanks to our advanced AI technology. Engage in meaningful conversations, ask about anything in the game world, and witness the impact of your choices on the story as it unfolds.


Delve into a rich narrative where characters have distinct personalities and backstories. Unravel the game’s plot organically by talking to the characters and choosing your quests based on your interactions with them.


Relive the charm of classic RPGs with our retro-style graphics and gameplay. Navigate a beautifully designed pixel-art world, encounter intriguing characters, and experience the nostalgia of turn-based combat.


Say goodbye to linear questlines and rigid objectives. In Solse AI-Quest, players can choose their quests organically by interacting with characters and exploring the game world, creating a unique adventure for every player.


Embark on an adventure full of surprises in Solse AI-Quest with unpredictable time-skip events. As you journey through the game, your actions and interactions with characters can trigger these events, during which you find yourself temporarily transported to another realm.

While you’re away, the world continues to evolve, with the AI shaping the changes based on your choices and relationships. Upon your return, you’ll encounter intriguing alterations to characters’ lives, roles, and even the world itself. The specifics of these changes remain an enigma to be explored!

Delve into the secrets of the time-skip events and experience the excitement of an ever-changing world, where your decisions forge a truly unique adventure.

What if characters in RPGs would actually have personalities, world-knowledge, backstories and motivations? What if you could interact with them and get a more immersive experience?

This is what Solse AI-Quest explores. A unique and immersive retro-style RPG where every conversation truly matters. Experience a gaming adventure like never before, with advanced AI that brings in-game characters to life through natural and dynamic interactions.



Experience natural and dynamic interactions with in-game characters like never before, thanks to our advanced AI technology. Engage in meaningful conversations, ask about anything in the game world, and witness the impact of your choices on the story as it unfolds.


Delve into a rich narrative where characters have distinct personalities and backstories. Unravel the game’s plot organically by talking to the characters and choosing your quests based on your interactions with them.


Relive the charm of classic RPGs with our retro-style graphics and gameplay. Navigate a beautifully designed pixel-art world, encounter intriguing characters, and experience the nostalgia of turn-based combat.


Say goodbye to linear questlines and rigid objectives. In Solse AI-Quest, players can choose their quests organically by interacting with characters and exploring the game world, creating a unique adventure for every player.


Embark on an adventure full of surprises in Solse AI-Quest with unpredictable time-skip events. As you journey through the game, your actions and interactions with characters can trigger these events, during which you find yourself temporarily transported to another realm.

Upon your return, you’ll encounter intriguing alterations to characters’ lives, roles, and even the world itself. The specifics of these changes remain an enigma to be explored!

Delve into the secrets of the time-skip events and experience the excitement of an ever-changing world, where your decisions forge a truly unique adventure.
legal_notice: This game uses an AI back-end service. No player information is saved. Conversation is only saved for training purposes (with no connection to player) based on agreement given in in-game menu at start of the game.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04. 18.04. 20.4 LTS, CentOS 7.
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.3GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: INTEL HD Graphics 530
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04. 18.04. 20.4 LTS, CentOS 7.
  • Processor: AMD A8-Series 3.1GHz / Intel® Core™ i5 2.8GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ RX 470 / NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 960
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card

name: Solse AI-Quest

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.3GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: INTEL HD Graphics 530
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: AMD A8-Series 3.1GHz / Intel® Core™ i5 2.8GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM

short_description: Solse AI-Quest: an AI-powered RPG where conversations shape the adventure. Navigate a pixel-art world, engage with dynamic characters, and influence the story through choice-driven actions and time skips. A retro-style game re-imagined.
